TEXT.TITLE: MOHAWK DATA <MDS> AFFILIATE IN SERVICE DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Mohawk Data Sciences Corp's Momentum Technologies Inc affiliate said it has signed an agreement to provide support and service for all Fivestar Electronics Inc branded products nationwide. Value was not disclosed. Reuter
